welcome_message_body: Welcome to Musashimurayama, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Wifi is free for all passengers and can be accessed throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for military use.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.
